# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-104">Definições da entidade de tipo de informações confidenciais </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-108">Número de roteamento ABA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-109">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-110">nove dígitos que podem estar em um padrão formatado ou não formatado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-111">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-112">dois dígitos nos intervalos 00-12, 21-32, 61-72 ou 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-113">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-114">um hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-115">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-116">um hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-117">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-118">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-119">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-120">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-121">Uma política tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-122">A função Func_aba_routing localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-123">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_ABA_Routing for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-124">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-125">A função Func_aba_routing localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-143">Número DNI (identidade nacional da Argentina)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-144">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-145">Oito dígitos com ou sem períodos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-146">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-147">Oito dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-148">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-149">um período opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-150">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-151">um período opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-152">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-153">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-154">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-155">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-156">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-157">A expressão regular Regex_argentina_national_id encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-158">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_argentina_national_id é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-170">Chave de Identificação Fiscal Exclusiva da Argentina (CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-171">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-172">11 dígitos com traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-172">Eleven digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-173">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-174">11 dígitos com um traço:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-174">Eleven digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-175">dois dígitos em 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 ou 34</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-176">um hífen (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-177">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-178">um hífen (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-179">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-180">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-181">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-182">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-183">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-184">A função `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-185">Uma palavra-chave de `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-186">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-187">A função `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-226">Número da conta bancária da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-227">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-228">seis a dez dígitos com ou sem um número de filial de estado do banco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-228">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-229">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-230">O número da conta é de 6 a 10 dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-231">Número BSB da Austrália:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-232">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-233">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-233">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-234">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-235">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-236">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-237">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-238">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-239">A expressão regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-240">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_australia_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-241">A expressão regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-242">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-243">A expressão regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-244">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_australia_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-328">Número da carteira de motorista da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-328">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-329">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-330">nove letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-331">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-332">nove letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-333">dois dígitos ou letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-334">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-335">cinco dígitos ou letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-336">OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-337">uma a duas letras opcionais (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-338">de quatro a nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-339">OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-340">nove dígitos ou letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-341">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-342">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-343">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-344">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-345">A expressão regular Regex_australia_drivers_license_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-346">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-347">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-447">Número da conta médica da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-448">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-449">10 a 11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-450">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-451">10 a 11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-452">Primeiro dígito está no intervalo de 2 a 6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-453">Nove dígitos é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-453">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-454">O décimo dígito é o dígito do problema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-455">O décimo primeiro dígito (opcional) é o número individual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-456">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-457">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-458">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-459">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-460">A função Func_australian_medical_account_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-461">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-462">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml

<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">

     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-474">Número do passaporte da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-475">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-476">oito ou nove caracteres alfanuméricos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span> 

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-477">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-478">uma letra (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) seguida por 7 dígitos ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by 7 digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-479">2 letras (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) seguidas por 7 dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-479">2 letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by 7 digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-480">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-481">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-482">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-483">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-484">A expressão regular `Regex_australia_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-485">Uma palavra-chave de `Keyword_australia_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-486">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-487">A expressão regular `Regex_australia_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>  
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-507">Número do arquivo fiscal da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-508">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-509">oito a nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-510">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-511">oito a nove dígitos normalmente apresentados com espaços da seguinte maneira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-512">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-512">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-513">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-513">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-514">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-514">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-515">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-515">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-516">dois a três dígitos onde o último dígito é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-517">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-518">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-519">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-520">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-521">A função Func_australian_tax_file_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-522">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number ou Keyword_number_exclusions for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-523">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-535">Número da carteira de motorista da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-536">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-537">oito dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-538">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-539">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-539">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-540">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-541">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-541">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-542">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-543">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-544">A expressão regular  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-545">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-672">Cartão de identidade da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-673">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-674">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-675">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-676">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-677">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-678">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-679">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-680">Uma combinação de 24 caracteres de letras, dígitos e caracteres especiais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-681">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-682">24 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-682">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="d517c-683">22 letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas), dígitos, backslashes, barras de avanço ou sinais de mais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-684">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas), dígitos, backslashes, barras para frente, mais sinais ou sinais de igual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-685">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-686">Não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-686">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-687">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-688">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-689">A expressão regular  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-690">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-696">Número do passaporte da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-697">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-698">Uma letra seguida de um espaço opcional e sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-699">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-700">Uma combinação de uma letra, sete dígitos e um espaço:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-701">uma letra (não sensível a minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-702">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-703">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-703">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-704">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-705">não se aplica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-705">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-706">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-707">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-708">A expressão regular  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-709">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-710">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-711">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-712">A expressão regular  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-713">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-737">Número da Previdência Social da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-738">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-739">10 dígitos no formato especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-740">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-741">10 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-741">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-742">três dígitos que correspondem a um número de série</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-743">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-744">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (DDMMYYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-745">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-746">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-747">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-748">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-749">A função  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-750">uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-751">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-752">A função  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-778">Número de identificação fiscal da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-779">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-780">nove dígitos com hífen opcional e barra de avanço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-781">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-782">nove dígitos com hífen opcional e barra de avanço:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-783">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-784">um hífen (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-785">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-786">uma barra de avanço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-787">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-787">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-788">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-789">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-789">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-790">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-791">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-792">A função  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-793">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-794">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-795">A função  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-818">Imposto sobre o valor adicionado da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-819">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-820">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-821">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-822">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-823">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-824">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-825">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-826">Padrão alfanumérico de 11 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-827">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-828">Padrão alfanumérico de 11 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-829">A ou a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-830">T ou t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-831">Espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-832">U ou u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-833">espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-834">dois ou três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-835">espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-836">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-837">espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-838">um ou dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-839">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-840">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-841">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-842">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-843">A função Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-844">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-845">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-846">A função Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-864">Chave de auth do Azure DocumentDB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-865">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-866">A cadeia de caracteres "DocumentDb" seguida pelos caracteres e cadeias de caracteres descritos no padrão abaixo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-867">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-868">A cadeia de caracteres "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-869">Qualquer combinação entre 3 a 200 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-870">Um símbolo maior do que >, um sinal de igual (=), uma aspas ("), ou um apóstrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-871">Qualquer combinação de 86 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, barra (/) ou sinal de mais (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-872">Dois sinais iguais (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-873">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-874">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-875">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-876">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-877">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-878">A expressão regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords não encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-893">Cadeia de conexão de banco de dados iaas do Azure e cadeia de SQL de conexão do Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-893">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-894">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-894">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-895">A cadeia de caracteres "Server", "server" ou "data source" seguida pelos caracteres e cadeias de caracteres descritos no padrão abaixo, incluindo a cadeia de caracteres "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-895">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="d517c-896">com" ou "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-896">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="d517c-897">net" ou "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-897">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="d517c-898">net", e a cadeia de caracteres "Password" ou "password" ou "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-898">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-899">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-899">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-900">a cadeia de caracteres "Server", "server" ou "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-900">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-901">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-902">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-903">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-904">qualquer combinação de entre 1 a 200 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-904">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-905">A cadeia de caracteres "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-905">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="d517c-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="d517c-907">net", ou "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-907">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="d517c-908">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-908">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-909">qualquer combinação de entre 1 a 300 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-909">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-910">a cadeia de caracteres "Password", "password" ou "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-910">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-911">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-911">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-912">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-913">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-914">um ou mais caracteres que não são ponto-e-vírgula (;), aspas ("), ou apóstrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-914">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-915">um ponto e vírgula (;), aspas ("), ou apóstrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-915">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-916">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-917">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-918">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-919">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-919">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1036">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1036">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1037">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1038">A cadeia de caracteres "sig" seguida pelos caracteres e cadeias de caracteres descritas no padrão abaixo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1038">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1039">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1039">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1040">a cadeia de caracteres "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1040">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1041">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1041">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1042">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1042">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1043">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1043">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1044">qualquer combinação de entre 43 a 53 caracteres que sejam letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos ou o sinal de porcentagem (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1044">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1045">a cadeia de caracteres "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1045">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1046">qualquer caractere que não seja uma letra, dígito ou sinal de porcentagem inferior ou maiúscula (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1046">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1047">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1048">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1048">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1049">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1050">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1051">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_AzureSAS encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1051">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1052">Cadeia de conexão do barramento de serviço do Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1052">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1053">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1054">A cadeia de caracteres "EndPoint" seguida pelos caracteres e cadeias de caracteres descritas no padrão abaixo, incluindo as cadeias de caracteres "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1054">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1055">net" e "SharedAccesKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1055">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1056">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1056">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1057">a cadeia de caracteres "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1057">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1058">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1058">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1059">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1059">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1060">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1060">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1061">qualquer combinação de entre 1 a 200 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1061">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1062">a cadeia de caracteres "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1062">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1063">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1063">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1064">qualquer combinação de entre 1 a 200 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1064">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1065">a cadeia de caracteres "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1065">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1066">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1066">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1067">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1067">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1068">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1068">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1069">qualquer combinação de 43 caracteres que sejam letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, barra (/) ou sinal de mais (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1069">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1070">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1070">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1071">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1071">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1072">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1072">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1073">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1073">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1074">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1074">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1075">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1075">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1076">A expressão regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords não encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1076">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1097">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1097">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1103">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1103">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1109">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>

</Entity>
```
