## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1130">Chave de conta do Azure Armazenamento (genérica)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1130">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1131">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1131">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1132">Qualquer combinação de 86 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, a barra (/) ou sinal de mais (+), precedida ou seguida pelos caracteres descritos no padrão abaixo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1132">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1133">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1133">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1134">zero para um dos símbolos maior que (>), apóstrofo ('), sinal de igual (=), a aspas ("), ou sinal de número (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1134">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1135">qualquer combinação de 86 caracteres que sejam letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, a barra para frente (/) ou sinal de mais (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1135">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1136">dois sinais iguais (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1136">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1137">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1138">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1139">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1140">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1140">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1141">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1141">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1142">Número da carteira de motorista belga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1142">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1143">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1144">10 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1144">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1145">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1146">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1146">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1147">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1148">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1148">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1149">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1150">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1150">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1151">A expressão regular  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1151">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1152">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1152">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1285">Número nacional belga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1285">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1286">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1287">11 dígitos mais delimitadores opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1287">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1288">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1289">11 dígitos mais delimitadores.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1289">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1290">seis dígitos e dois períodos opcionais no formato YY. MM.DD para data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1290">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1291">Umlimiter opcional de ponto, traço, espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1291">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1292">três dígitos sequenciais (ímpar para homens, mesmo para mulheres)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1292">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1293">Umlimiter opcional de ponto, traço, espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1293">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1294">dois dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1294">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1295">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1296">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1296">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1297">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1298">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1299">A função Func_belgium_national_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1299">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1300">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_belgium_national_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1300">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1301">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1301">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1302">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1302">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1303">A função Func_belgium_national_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1303">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1304">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1304">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1363">Número do passaporte belga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1363">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1364">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1365">duas letras seguidas por seis dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1365">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1366">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1367">duas letras e seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1367">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1368">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1369">não se aplica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1369">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1370">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1370">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1371">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1372">A expressão regular  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1372">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1373">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1373">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1374">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date2` localiza data no formato DD MM YY ou uma palavra-chave de ou é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1374">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1375">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1375">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1376">A expressão regular  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1376">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1377">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1377">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1411">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1412">Padrão alfanumérico de 12 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1412">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1413">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1414">Padrão alfanumérico de 12 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1414">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1426">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1429">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1430">A função Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1430">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1443">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1444">11 dígitos que incluem um dígito de verificação e podem ser formatados ou não formatados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1444">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1445">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1446">Formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1446">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1447">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1447">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1448">um ponto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1448">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1449">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1449">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1450">um ponto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1450">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1451">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1451">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1452">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1452">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1453">dois dígitos que são dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1453">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1454">Não formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1454">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1455">11 dígitos em que os dois últimos dígitos são dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1455">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1456">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1457">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1458">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1459">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1460">A função Func_brazil_cpf localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1460">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1461">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_brazil_cpf é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1461">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1462">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1462">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1463">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1464">A função Func_brazil_cpf localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1464">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1465">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1477">Número da entidade jurídica do Brasil (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1477">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1478">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1479">14 dígitos que incluem um número de registro, o número da ramificação e dígitos de verificação, além de delimitadores de seleção</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1479">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1480">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1481">14 dígitos mais delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1481">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1482">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1482">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1483">um ponto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1483">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1484">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1484">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1485">um ponto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1485">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1486">três dígitos (esses primeiros oito dígitos são o número de registro)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1486">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1487">uma barra de avanço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1487">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1488">número de filial de quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1488">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1489">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1489">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1490">dois dígitos que são dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1490">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1491">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1492">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1492">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1493">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1494">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1494">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1495">A função Func_brazil_cnpj localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1495">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1496">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_brazil_cnpj é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1496">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1497">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1497">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1498">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1498">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1499">A função Func_brazil_cnpj localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1499">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1500">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1522">RG (Cartão de Identificação Nacional do Brasil)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1522">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1523">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1524">Registro Geral (formato antigo): Nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1524">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (novo formato): 11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1526">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1527">Registro Geral (formato antigo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1527">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1528">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1528">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1529">um ponto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1529">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1530">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1530">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1531">um ponto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1531">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1532">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1532">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1533">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1533">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1534">um dígito que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1534">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (novo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1536">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1536">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1537">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1537">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1538">um dígito que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1538">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1539">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1540">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1540">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1541">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1542">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1542">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1543">A função Func_brazil_rg encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1543">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1544">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_brazil_rg é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1544">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1545">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1545">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1556">Número da carteira de motorista da Bulgária</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1556">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1557">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1558">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1558">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1559">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1560">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1560">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1561">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1562">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1563">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1564">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1565">A expressão regular  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1565">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1566">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1693">Número civil uniforme da Bulgária</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1693">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1694">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1694">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1695">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1695">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1696">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1696">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1697">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1697">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1698">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1698">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1699">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1699">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1700">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1701">10 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1701">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1702">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1703">10 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1703">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1704">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1704">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1705">dois dígitos que correspondem à ordem de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1705">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1706">um dígito que corresponde ao sexo: um dígito único para o sexo masculino e um dígito ímpar para o sexo feminino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1706">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1707">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1707">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1708">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1709">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1709">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1710">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1711">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1712">A função  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1712">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1713">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1713">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1714">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1714">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1715">A função  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1715">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1760">Número do passaporte da Bulgária</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1760">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1761">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1762">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1762">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1763">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1764">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1764">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1765">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1766">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1766">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1767">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1768">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1769">A expressão regular  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1769">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1770">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1771">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1771">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1772">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1773">A expressão regular  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1773">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1774">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1774">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1794">Número da conta bancária do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1794">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1795">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1796">7 ou 12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1796">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1797">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1798">Um Número de Conta Bancária do Canadá tem 7 ou 12 dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1798">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1799">Um número de trânsito de conta bancária do Canadá tem:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1799">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1800">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1800">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1801">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1801">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1802">OR de três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1802">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1803">zero "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1803">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1804">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1804">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1805">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1806">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1807">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1808">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1808">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1809">A expressão regular Regex_canada_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1809">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1810">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_canada_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1811">A expressão regular Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1811">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1812">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1813">A expressão regular Regex_canada_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1813">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1814">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_canada_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1814">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1838">Número da carteira de motorista do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1838">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1839">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1840">Varia por província</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1840">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1841">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1842">Vários padrões que abrangem Alberta, Columbia Britânica, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Escócia, Ontário, Ilha do Príncipe Eduardo, Quebec e Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1842">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1843">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1844">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1844">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1845">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1846">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1847">A função Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1847">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1848">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1848">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1849">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_canada_drivers_license for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1849">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1985">Número do serviço de saúde do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1985">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1986">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1986">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1987">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1987">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1988">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1988">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1989">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1989">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1990">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1991">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1991">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-1992">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-1993">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1994">A expressão regular Regex_canada_health_service_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1994">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-1995">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_canada_health_service_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-1995">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2007">Número do passaporte do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2007">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2008">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2008">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2009">duas letras maiúsculas seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2009">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2010">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2010">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2014">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2014">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2015">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2015">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2016">A expressão regular Regex_canada_passport_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2016">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2017">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_canada_passport_number ou Keyword_passport é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2017">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2047">Número de identificação de saúde pessoal do Canadá (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2047">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2048">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2048">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2049">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2049">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2050">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2050">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2051">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2051">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2052">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2053">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2053">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2054">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2054">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2055">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2055">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2056">A expressão regular Regex_canada_phin localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2056">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2057">Pelo menos duas palavras-chave de Keyword_canada_phin ou Keyword_canada_provinces são encontradas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2057">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2090">Número do seguro social do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2090">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2091">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2092">nove dígitos com hifens opcionais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2092">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2093">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2094">Formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2094">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2095">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2095">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2096">um hífen ou espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2096">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2097">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2097">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2098">um hífen ou espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2098">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2099">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2099">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2100">Não formatado: nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2100">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2101">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2102">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2102">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2103">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2104">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2104">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2105">A função Func_canadian_sin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2105">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2106">Pelo menos duas de qualquer combinação do seguinte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2106">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2107">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_sin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2107">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2108">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_sin_collaborative for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2108">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2109">A função Func_eu_date encontra uma data no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2109">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2110">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2110">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2111">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2111">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2112">A função Func_unformatted_canadian_sin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2112">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2113">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_sin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2113">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2114">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2114">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2139">Número do cartão de identidade do Chile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2139">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2140">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2141">sete a oito dígitos mais delimitadores de um dígito de verificação ou letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2141">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2142">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2143">sete a oito dígitos mais delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2143">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2144">de um a dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2144">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2145">um período opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2145">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2146">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2146">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2147">um período opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2147">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2148">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2148">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2149">um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2149">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2150">um dígito ou letra (não sensível a minúsculas), que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2150">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2151">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2152">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2152">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2153">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2154">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2155">A função Func_chile_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2155">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2156">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_chile_id_card é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2156">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2157">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2157">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2158">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2158">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2159">A função Func_chile_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2159">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2160">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2197">Número do cartão de identidade de residente da China (PRC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2197">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2198">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2199">18 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2199">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2200">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2201">18 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2201">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2202">seis dígitos que são um código de endereço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2202">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2203">oito dígitos no formato YYYYMMDD, que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2203">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2204">três dígitos que são um código de ordem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2204">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2205">um dígito que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2205">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2206">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2207">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2207">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2208">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2209">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2209">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2210">A função Func_china_resident_id encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2210">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2211">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_china_resident_id é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2211">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2212">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2212">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2213">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2214">A função Func_china_resident_id encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2214">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2215">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2215">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2216">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2216">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2221">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2221">身份证</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2223">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2223">居民身份证</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2228">Número do cartão de crédito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2228">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2229">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2230">14 a 16 dígitos que podem ser formatados ou não formatados (ddddddd) e que devem passar no teste luhn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2230">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2231">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2232">Padrão complexo e robusto que detecta cartões de todas as principais marcas em todo o mundo, incluindo Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, cartões de presente e cartões de lanchonete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2232">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2233">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2234">Sim, a soma de verificação Luhn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2234">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2235">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2236">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2237">A função Func_credit_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2237">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2238">Uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2239">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_cc_verification for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2239">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2240">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_cc_name for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2240">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2241">A função Func_expiration_date encontra uma data no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2241">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2242">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2243">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2243">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2244">A função Func_credit_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2244">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2245">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2245">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
