## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2505">Número da carteira de motorista da Croácia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2505">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2506">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2507">oito dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2507">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2508">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2509">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2509">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2510">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2511">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2511">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2512">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2513">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2513">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2514">A expressão regular  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2514">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2515">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2515">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2639">Número do cartão de identidade croata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2639">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2640">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está incluída no tipo de informação confidenciais número de identificação nacional da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2640">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2641">Ele está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação independente e sensível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2641">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2642">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2642">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2643">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2643">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2644">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2644">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2645">nove dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2645">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2646">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2647">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2648">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2649">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2650">A função Func_croatia_id_card encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2650">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2651">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_croatia_id_card é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2651">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2682">Número do passaporte croata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2682">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2683">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2684">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2684">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2685">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2686">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2686">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2687">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2688">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2688">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2689">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2690">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2690">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2691">A expressão regular  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2691">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2692">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2692">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2693">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2693">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2694">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2694">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2695">A expressão regular  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2695">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2696">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2696">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2714">Número de identificação pessoal da Croácia (OIB)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2714">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2715">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2715">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2716">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2716">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2717">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2717">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2718">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2718">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2719">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2719">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2720">dígito final é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2720">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2721">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2722">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2722">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2723">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2724">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2724">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2725">A função Func_croatia_oib_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2725">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2726">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2726">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2727">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2727">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2728">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2728">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2729">A função Func_croatia_oib_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2729">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2730">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2730">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2761">Número da licença de drivers chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2761">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2762">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2763">12 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2763">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2764">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2765">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2765">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2766">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2767">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2767">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2768">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2769">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2769">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2770">A expressão regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2770">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2771">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2771">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2896">Cartão de identidade chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2896">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2897">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2897">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2898">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2898">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2899">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2899">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2900">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2900">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2901">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2901">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2902">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2902">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2903">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2904">10 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2904">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2905">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2906">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2906">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2907">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2908">não se aplica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2908">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2909">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2910">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2910">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2911">A expressão regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2911">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2912">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2912">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2913">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2913">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2921">Número do passaporte chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2921">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2922">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2923">uma letra seguida de 6 a 8 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2923">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2924">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2925">uma letra seguida de seis a oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2925">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2926">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2926">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2927">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2927">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2928">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2928">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2929">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2929">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2930">A expressão regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2930">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2931">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2931">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2932">A expressão regular `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` localiza a data no formato DD/MM/YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2932">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2933">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2933">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2934">A expressão regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2934">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2935">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2935">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2964">Número de identificação fiscal de Chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2964">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2965">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2965">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2966">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2966">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2967">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2967">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2968">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2968">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2969">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2969">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2970">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2970">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2971">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2972">oito dígitos e uma letra no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2972">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2973">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2974">oito dígitos e uma letra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2974">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2975">um "0" ou "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2975">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2976">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2976">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2977">uma letra (não sensível a minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2977">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2978">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2979">não se aplica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2979">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-2980">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2981">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2981">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2982">A função  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2982">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2983">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2983">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-2984">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2984">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-2985">A função  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-2985">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3013">Número da carteira de motorista tcheca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3013">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3014">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3014">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3015">duas letras seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3015">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3016">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3016">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3017">oito letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3017">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3018">letra 'E' (não sensitivo para minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3018">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3019">uma carta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3019">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3020">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3020">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3021">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3021">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3022">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3023">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3023">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3024">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3025">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3026">A expressão regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3026">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3027">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3027">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3153">Número do passaporte tcheco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3153">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3154">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3155">oito dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3155">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3156">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3157">oito dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3157">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3158">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3159">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3159">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3160">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3161">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3161">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3162">A expressão regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3162">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3163">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3163">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3164">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3164">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3165">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3165">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3166">A expressão regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3166">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3167">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3167">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3189">Número da identidade pessoal tcheca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3189">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3190">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3191">nove dígitos com barra de avanço opcional (formato antigo) 10 dígitos com barra de avanço opcional (novo formato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3191">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3192">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3193">nove dígitos (formato antigo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3193">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3194">seis dígitos que representam a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3194">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3195">uma barra de avanço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3195">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3196">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3196">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3197">10 dígitos (novo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3197">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3198">seis dígitos que representam a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3198">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3199">uma barra de avanço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3199">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3200">quatro dígitos em que o último dígito é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3200">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3201">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3202">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3203">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3204">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3205">A função Func_czech_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3205">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3206">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_czech_id_card é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3206">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3207">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3207">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3208">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3208">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3209">A função Func_czech_id_card_new_format encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3209">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3210">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3257">Número da carteira de motorista da Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3257">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3258">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3259">oito dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3259">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3260">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3261">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3261">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3262">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3263">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3263">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3264">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3265">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3265">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3266">A expressão regular  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3266">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3267">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3267">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3391">Número do passaporte dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3391">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3392">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3393">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3393">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3394">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3395">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3395">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3396">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3397">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3397">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3398">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3399">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3400">A expressão regular  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3400">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3401">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3401">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3402">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date2` localiza a data no formato DD MM YY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3402">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3403">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3403">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3404">A expressão regular  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3404">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3405">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3405">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3425">Número de identificação pessoal da Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3425">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3426">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3427">10 dígitos que contêm um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3427">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3428">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3428">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3429">10 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3429">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3430">seis dígitos no formato DDMMYYY, que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3430">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3431">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3431">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3432">quatro dígitos onde o dígito final é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3432">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3433">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3433">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3434">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3434">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3435">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3435">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3436">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3437">A expressão regular Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3437">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3438">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_denmark_id é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3438">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3439">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3439">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3440">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3440">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3441">A expressão regular Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3441">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3442">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3442">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3514">Número da Agência de Imposição de Drogas (DEA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3514">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3515">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3516">duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3516">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3517">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3518">O padrão deve incluir todos os seguintes itens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3518">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3519">uma letra (não sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas) desse conjunto de letras possíveis: abcdefghjklmnprstux, que é um código de registro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3519">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3520">uma letra (não sensível a minúsculas), que é a primeira letra do sobrenome ou dígito do registro '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3520">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3521">sete dígitos, o último dos quais é o dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3521">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3522">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3523">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3523">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3524">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3525">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3525">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3526">A função Func_dea_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3526">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3527">Uma palavra-chave `Keyword_dea_number` de é encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3527">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3528">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3528">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3529">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3529">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3530">A função Func_dea_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3530">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3531">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3531">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3532">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3532">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3534">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3534">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3535">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3535">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3536">administração de imposição de drogas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3536">drug enforcement administration</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3538">Número da carteira de motorista da Estônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3538">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3539">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3540">duas letras seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3540">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3541">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3542">duas letras e seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3542">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3543">as letras "ET" (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3543">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3544">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3544">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3545">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3546">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3546">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3547">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3548">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3548">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3549">A expressão regular  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3549">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3550">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3550">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3676">Código de Identificação Pessoal da Estônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3676">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3677">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3677">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3678">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3678">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3679">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3680">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3681">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3682">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3683">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3684">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3684">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3685">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3686">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3687">um dígito que corresponde ao sexo e ao século de nascimento (número ímpar do sexo masculino, número par do sexo feminino; 1-2: século 19; 3-4: século 20; 5-6: século 21)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3687">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3688">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3688">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3689">três dígitos que correspondem a um número de série separando as pessoas que nasceram na mesma data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3689">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3690">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3690">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3691">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3692">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3693">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3694">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3695">A função  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3695">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3696">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3696">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3697">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3698">A função  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3698">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3731">Número do passaporte da Estônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3731">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3732">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3733">uma letra seguida por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3733">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3734">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3735">uma letra seguida por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3735">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3736">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3737">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3737">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3738">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3739">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3739">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3740">A expressão regular  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3740">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3741">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3741">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3742">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3742">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3743">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3743">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3744">A expressão regular  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3744">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3745">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3745">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3763">Número do cartão de débito da UE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3763">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3764">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3765">16 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3765">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3766">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3767">Padrão complexo e robusto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3767">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3768">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3769">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3769">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-3770">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-3771">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3771">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3772">A função Func_eu_debit_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3772">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3773">Pelo menos uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3773">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3774">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_eu_debit_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3774">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3775">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_card_terms_dict for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3775">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3776">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_card_security_terms_dict for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3776">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3777">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3777">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3778">A função Func_expiration_date encontra uma data no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3778">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-3779">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-3779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
