## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4226">Número da carteira de motorista da Finlândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4226">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4227">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4228">10 dígitos que contêm um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4228">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4229">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4230">10 dígitos contendo um hífen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4230">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4231">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4231">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4232">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4232">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4233">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4233">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4234">um dígito ou uma letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4234">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4235">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4236">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4236">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4237">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4238">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4238">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4239">A expressão regular  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4239">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4240">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4240">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4371">Número do seguro de saúde europeu da Finlândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4371">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4372">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4372">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4373">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4373">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4374">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4374">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4375">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4375">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4376">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4376">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4377">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4377">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4378">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4379">Número de 20 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4379">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4380">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4381">Número de 20 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4381">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4382">10 dígitos - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4382">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4383">um espaço opcional ou hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4383">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4384">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4384">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4385">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4385">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4386">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4386">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4387">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4387">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4388">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4388">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4389">O regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4389">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4390">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4390">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4408">ID nacional da Finlândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4408">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4409">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4410">seis dígitos mais um caractere indicando um século mais três dígitos mais um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4410">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4411">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4412">O padrão deve incluir todos os seguintes itens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4412">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4413">seis dígitos no formato DDMMYYY, que são uma data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4413">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4414">marcador de século ('-', '+' ou 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4414">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4415">número de identificação pessoal de três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4415">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4416">um dígito ou uma letra (insensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas), que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4416">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4417">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4418">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4418">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4419">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4420">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4420">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4421">a função Func_finnish_national_id encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4421">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4422">uma palavra-chave de Keyword_finnish_national_id é encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4422">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4423">o checksum passa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4423">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4424">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4424">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4425">a função Func_finnish_national_id encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4425">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4426">o checksum passa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4426">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4475">Número do passaporte finlandês</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4475">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4476">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está disponível no tipo de informação confidenciais número de passaporte da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais autônomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4476">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4477">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4477">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4478">combinação de nove letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4478">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4479">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4479">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4480">combinação de nove letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4480">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4481">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4481">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4482">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4482">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4483">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4484">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4484">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4485">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4486">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4486">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4487">A expressão regular `Regex_finland_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4487">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4488">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keyword_finland_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4488">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4489">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4489">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4490">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4491">A expressão regular `Regex_finland_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4491">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4492">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keyword_finland_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4492">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4516">Número da carteira de motorista da França</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4516">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4517">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está disponível no tipo de informação confidenciais número de licença de motorista da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais autônomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4517">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4518">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4519">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4519">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4520">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4521">12 dígitos com a validação para descontar padrões similares, como números de telefone em francês</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4521">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4522">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4523">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4523">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4524">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4525">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4526">a função Func_french_drivers_license encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4526">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4527">uma palavra-chave de Keyword_french_drivers_license é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4527">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4528">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4528">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4655">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4655">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4656">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4656">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4657">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4657">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4658">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4658">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4659">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4659">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4660">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4660">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4661">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4662">Número de 21 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4662">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4663">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4664">Número de 21 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4664">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4665">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4665">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4666">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4666">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4667">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4667">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4668">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4669">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4669">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4670">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4671">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4671">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4672">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4673">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4673">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4674">o regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4674">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4681">CNI (National ID Card) da França</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4681">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4683">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4683">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4684">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4685">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4685">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4686">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4686">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4687">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4687">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4688">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4688">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4689">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4689">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4690">A expressão regular Regex_france_cni localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4690">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->

      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4705">Número do passaporte francês</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4705">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4706">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está disponível no tipo de informação confidenciais número de passaporte da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4706">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4707">Ele está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação independente e sensível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4707">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4708">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4709">nove dígitos e letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4709">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4710">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4710">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4711">nove dígitos e letras:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4711">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4712">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4712">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4713">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4713">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4714">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4714">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4715">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4716">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4717">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4718">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4718">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4719">A função `Func_fr_passport` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4719">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4720">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4720">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4721">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date3` localiza data no formato DD MM YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4721">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4722">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4723">A função `Func_fr_passport` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4723">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4724">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4724">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4755">Número de segurança social da França (INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4755">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4756">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4757">15 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4757">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4758">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4759">Deve corresponder a um dos dois padrões:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4759">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4760">13 dígitos seguidos por um espaço seguido por dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4760">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4761">ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4761">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4762">15 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4762">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4763">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4764">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4764">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4765">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4766">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4766">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4767">A função `Func_french_insee` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4767">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4768">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_fr_insee for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4768">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4769">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4769">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4770">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4770">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4771">A função Func_french_insee ou Func_fr_insee o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4771">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4772">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4772">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4773">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4773">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4774">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4774">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4803">Número de identificação fiscal da França</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4803">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4804">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4805">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4805">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4806">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4807">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4807">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4808">Um dígito que deve ser 0, 1, 2 ou 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4808">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4809">Um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4809">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4810">Um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4810">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4811">Dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4811">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4812">Um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4812">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4813">Três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4813">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4814">Um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4814">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4815">Três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4815">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4816">Um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4816">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4817">Três dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4817">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4818">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4818">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4819">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4819">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4820">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4820">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4821">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4821">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4822">A função  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4822">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4823">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4823">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4824">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4824">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4825">A função  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4825">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4845">Número de imposto adicionado ao valor da França</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4845">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4846">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4846">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4847">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4847">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4848">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4848">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4850">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4850">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4851">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4851">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4852">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4853">Padrão alfanumérico de 13 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4853">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4854">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4855">Padrão alfanumérico de 13 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4855">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4856">duas letras - FR (insensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4856">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4857">um espaço opcional ou hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4857">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4858">duas letras ou dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4858">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4859">um espaço opcional, ponto, hífen ou vírgula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4859">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4860">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4860">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4861">um espaço opcional, ponto, hífen ou vírgula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4861">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4862">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4862">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4863">um espaço opcional, ponto, hífen ou vírgula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4863">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4864">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4864">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4865">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4866">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4866">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4867">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4868">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4868">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4869">A função Func_france_value_added_tax_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4869">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4870">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4870">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4871">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4871">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4872">A função Func_france_value_added_tax_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4872">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4885">Número da carteira de motorista da Alemanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4885">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4886">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está incluída no tipo de informação confidenciais do Número de Licença do Driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4886">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4887">Ele está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação independente e sensível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4887">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4888">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4889">combinação de 11 dígitos e letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4889">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4890">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4891">11 dígitos e letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4891">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4892">um dígito ou uma letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4892">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4893">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4893">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4894">seis dígitos ou letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4894">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4895">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4895">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4896">um dígito ou uma letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4896">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4897">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4898">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4898">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-4899">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-4900">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4900">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4901">A função Func_german_drivers_license localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4901">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4902">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_german_drivers_license_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4902">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-4903">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-4903">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5052">Número do cartão de identidade da Alemanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5052">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5053">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5054">desde 1º de novembro de 2010: Nove letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5054">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5055">de 1º de abril de 1987 a 31 de outubro de 2010: 10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5055">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5056">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5057">desde 1º de novembro de 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5057">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5058">uma letra (não sensível a minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5058">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5059">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5059">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5060">de 1º de abril de 1987 a 31 de outubro de 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5060">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5061">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5061">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5062">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5063">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5063">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5064">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5065">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5065">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5066">A expressão regular Regex_germany_id_card encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5066">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5067">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_germany_id_card é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5067">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5083">Número do passaporte da Alemanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5083">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5084">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está incluída no tipo de informação confidenciais número de passaporte da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação independente e confidenciais.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5084">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5085">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5086">10 dígitos ou letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5086">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5087">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5088">O padrão deve incluir todos os seguintes itens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5088">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5089">primeiro caractere é um dígito ou uma letra deste conjunto (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5089">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5090">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5090">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5091">cinco dígitos ou letras deste conjunto (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5091">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5092">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5092">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5093">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5093">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5094">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5094">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5095">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5095">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5096">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5096">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5097">A função Func_german_passport localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5097">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5098">Uma palavra-chave `Keyword_german_passport` de ou `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5098">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5099">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5099">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5100">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5100">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5101">A função Func_german_passport_data localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5101">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5102">Uma palavra-chave `Keyword_german_passport` de ou `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5102">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5103">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5103">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5126">Número de identificação fiscal da Alemanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5126">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5127">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5128">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5128">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5129">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5130">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5130">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5131">Dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5131">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5132">Um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5132">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5133">Três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5133">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5134">Um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5134">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5135">Três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5135">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5136">Um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5136">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5137">Dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5137">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5138">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5138">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5139">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5140">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5140">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5141">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5142">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5142">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5143">A função  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5143">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5144">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5144">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5145">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5145">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5146">A função  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5146">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5172">Número de imposto adicionado ao valor da Alemanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5172">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5173">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5173">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5174">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5174">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5175">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5175">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5176">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5176">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5177">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5177">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5178">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5178">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5179">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5180">Padrão alfanumérico de 11 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5180">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5181">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5182">Padrão alfanumérico de 11 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5182">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5183">uma letra D ou d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5183">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5184">uma letra E ou e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5184">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5185">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5185">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5186">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5186">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5187">um espaço opcional ou vírgula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5187">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5188">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5188">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5189">um espaço opcional ou vírgula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5189">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5190">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5191">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5192">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5192">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5193">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5194">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5194">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5195">A função Func_germany_value_added_tax_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5195">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5196">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5196">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5197">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5197">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5198">A função Func_germany_value_added_tax_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5198">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5208">Número da carteira de motorista da Grécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5208">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5209">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está incluída no tipo de informação confidenciais número de licença do driver da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais autônomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5209">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5210">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5211">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5211">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5212">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5213">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5213">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5214">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5215">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5215">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5216">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5217">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5217">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5218">A expressão regular  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5218">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5219">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5219">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5345">Cartão de identificação nacional da Grécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5345">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5346">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5346">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5347">Combinação de 7 a 8 letras e números mais um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5347">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5348">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5348">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5349">Sete letras e números (formato antigo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5349">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5350">Uma letra (qualquer letra do alfabeto grego) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5350">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5351">Um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5351">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5352">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5352">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5353">Oito letras e números (novo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5353">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5354">Duas letras cujos caracteres maiúsculos ocorre em alfabetos latino e grego (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5354">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5355">Um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5355">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5356">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5356">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5357">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5358">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5358">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5359">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5360">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5360">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5361">A expressão regular Regex_greece_id_card encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5361">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5362">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_greece_id_card é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5362">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5363">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5363">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5364">A expressão regular Regex_greece_id_card encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5364">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5369">cartão de ID pessoal grego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5369">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5370">id da polícia grega</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5370">greek police id</span></span>
