## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5375">Número do passaporte grego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5375">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5376">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5377">Duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5377">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5378">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5379">Duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5379">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5380">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5381">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5381">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5382">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5383">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5384">A expressão regular  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5384">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5385">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5385">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5386">A expressão regular localiza a data no `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` formato DD MMM YY (Exemplo - 28 de agosto de 19) ou uma palavra-chave de `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` é encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5386">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5387">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5388">A expressão regular  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5388">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5389">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5406">Número de Segurança Social da Grécia (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5406">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5407">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5407">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5408">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5408">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5409">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5409">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5410">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5410">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5411">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5411">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5412">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5412">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5413">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5414">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5414">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5415">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5415">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5416">6 dígitos como data de nascimento YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5416">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5417">4 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5417">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5418">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5418">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5419">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5420">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5420">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5421">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5422">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5422">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5423">A função  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5423">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5424">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5424">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5425">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5425">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5426">A função  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5426">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5447">Nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5447">Nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5452">A expressão regular  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5452">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5482">Número do cartão de identidade de Hong Kong (HKID)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5482">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5483">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5484">Combinação de 8 a 9 letras e números mais parênteses opcionais ao redor do caractere final</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5484">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5485">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5486">Combinação de 8 a 9 letras:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5486">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5487">1-2 letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5487">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5488">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5488">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5489">O caractere final (qualquer dígito ou a letra A), que é o dígito de verificação e é opcionalmente colocado entre parênteses.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5489">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5490">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5490">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5491">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5491">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5492">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5492">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5493">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5493">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5494">A função Func_hong_kong_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5494">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5495">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_hong_kong_id_card é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5495">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5496">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5496">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5497">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5497">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5498">A função Func_hong_kong_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5498">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5499">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5499">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5539">Número da carteira de motorista da Hungria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5539">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5540">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5541">Duas letras seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5541">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5542">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5543">Duas letras e seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5543">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5544">Duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5544">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5545">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5545">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5546">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5547">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5547">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5548">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5549">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5549">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5550">A expressão regular  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5550">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5551">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5551">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5676">Número de identificação pessoal da Hungria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5676">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5677">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5677">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5678">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5678">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5679">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5680">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5681">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5682">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5683">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5684">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5684">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5685">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5686">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5687">Um dígito que corresponde ao sexo (1 homem, 2 mulheres, outros números também são possíveis para cidadãos nascidos antes de 1900 ou cidadãos com dupla cidadania)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5687">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5688">Seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5688">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5689">Três dígitos que correspondem a um número de série</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5689">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5690">Um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5690">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5691">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5692">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5693">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5694">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5695">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5695">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5696">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5696">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5697">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5698">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5698">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5709">Número do passaporte húngaro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5709">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5710">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5710">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5711">Duas letras seguidas por seis ou sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5711">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5712">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5712">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5713">Duas letras seguidas por seis ou sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5713">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5714">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5714">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5715">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5715">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5716">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5716">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5717">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5717">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5718">A expressão regular  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5718">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5719">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5719">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5720">A expressão regular localiza a data no formato `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (Exemplo - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) ou uma palavra-chave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date` é encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5720">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5721">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5721">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5722">A expressão regular  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5722">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5723">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5723">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5744">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5745">Nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5745">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5746">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5747">Nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5747">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5748">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5749">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5749">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5750">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5751">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5752">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5752">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5753">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5753">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5754">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5754">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5755">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5755">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5775">Número de identificação fiscal da Hungria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5775">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5776">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5776">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5777">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5777">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5778">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5778">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5779">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5779">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5780">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5780">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5781">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5781">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5782">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5783">10 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5783">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5784">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5785">10 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5785">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5786">Um dígito que deve ser "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5786">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5787">Oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5787">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5788">Um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5788">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5789">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5790">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5790">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5791">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5792">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5792">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5793">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5793">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5794">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5794">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5795">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5795">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5796">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5796">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5823">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5824">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5825">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5826">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5827">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5828">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5829">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5830">Padrão alfanumérico de 10 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5830">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5831">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5832">Padrão alfanumérico de 10 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5832">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5833">duas letras - HU ou hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5833">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5834">espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5834">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5835">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5835">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5836">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5837">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5837">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5838">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5839">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5839">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5840">A função Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5840">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5841">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5841">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5842">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5842">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5843">A função Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5843">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5857">Número da conta permanente da Índia (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5857">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5858">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5859">10 letras ou dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5859">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5860">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5861">10 letras ou dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5861">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5862">Três letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5862">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5863">Uma letra em C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (não sensível a minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5863">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5864">Uma carta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5864">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5865">Quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5865">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5866">Uma letra que é um dígito de verificação alfabética</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5866">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5867">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5867">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5868">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5868">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5869">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5869">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5870">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5870">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5871">A expressão regular Regex_india_permanent_account_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5871">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5872">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_india_permanent_account_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5872">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5873">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5873">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5874">A expressão regular Regex_india_permanent_account_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5874">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5879">Número de identificação exclusiva da Índia (Aadhaar)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5879">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5880">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5881">12 dígitos contendo espaços opcionais ou traços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5881">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5882">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5883">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5883">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5884">Um dígito que não é 0 ou 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5884">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5885">Três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5885">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5886">Um espaço ou um traço opcional </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5886">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5887">Quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5887">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5888">Um espaço ou um traço opcional </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5888">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5889">O dígito final, que é o dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5889">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5890">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5891">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5891">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5892">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5893">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5893">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5894">A função Func_india_aadhaar encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5894">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5895">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_india_aadhar é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5895">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5896">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5896">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5897">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5897">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5898">A função Func_india_aadhaar encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5898">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5899">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5899">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5908">Número de cartão de identidade da Indonésia (KTP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5908">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5909">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5910">16 dígitos contendo pontos opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5910">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5911">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5912">16 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5912">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5913">Código de província de dois dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5913">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5914">Um ponto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5914">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5915">Código de dois dígitos da regência ou da cidade </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5915">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5916">Código de dois dígitos do subdistrito </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5916">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5917">Um ponto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5917">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5918">Seis dígitos no formato DDMMYYY, que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5918">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5919">Um ponto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5919">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5920">Quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5920">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5921">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5921">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5922">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5922">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5924">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5924">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5932">Número de conta bancária internacional (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5932">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5933">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5933">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5935">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5935">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5936">O padrão deve incluir todos os seguintes itens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5936">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5939">1 a 7 grupos de quatro letras ou dígitos (podem ser separados por espaços)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5939">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5940">1 a 3 letras ou dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5940">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5941">O formato para cada país é ligeiramente diferente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5941">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5942">O tipo de informação confidenciais do IBAN abrange esses 60 países:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5942">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk , sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-5988">Endereço IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5988">IP address</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-5998">Para IPv6, uma política de DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5998">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-5999">A expressão regular Regex_ipv6_address localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-5999">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6000">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_ipaddress for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6000">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6001">Para IPv4, uma política de DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6001">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6002">A expressão regular Regex_ipv4_address localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6002">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6004">Para IPv6, uma política de DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6004">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6005">A expressão regular Regex_ipv6_address localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6005">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6006">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_ipaddress for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6006">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6014">Número da carteira de motorista da Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6014">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6015">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6016">Seis dígitos seguidos por quatro letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6016">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6017">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6018">Seis dígitos e quatro letras:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6018">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6019">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6019">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6020">Quatro letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6020">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6021">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6021">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6022">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6022">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6023">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6023">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6024">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6024">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6025">A expressão regular  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6025">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6026">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6026">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6150">Número do passaporte da Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6150">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6151">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6152">Duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6152">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6153">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6154">Duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6154">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6155">Dois dígitos ou letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6155">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6156">Sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6156">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6157">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6157">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6158">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6158">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6159">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6159">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6160">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6160">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6161">A expressão regular  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6161">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6162">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6162">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6163">A expressão regular localiza a data no formato `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Exemplo - 01 BEA/MAIO de 1988) ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6163">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6164">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6165">A expressão regular  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6165">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6166">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6166">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6190">Número pps (serviço público pessoal) da Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6190">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6191">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6192">Formato antigo (até 31 de dezembro de 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6192">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6193">sete dígitos seguidos de 1 a 2 letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6193">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6194">Novo formato (1º de janeiro de 2013 e depois):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6194">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6195">sete dígitos seguidos por duas letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6195">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6196">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6197">Formato antigo (até 31 de dezembro de 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6197">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6198">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6198">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6199">uma a duas letras (sem maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6199">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6200">Novo formato (1º de janeiro de 2013 e depois):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6200">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6201">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6201">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6202">uma letra (não sensível a minúsculas) que é um dígito de verificação alfabética</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6202">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6203">Uma letra opcional no intervalo A-I ou "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6203">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6204">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6205">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6205">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6206">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6207">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6208">A função Func_ireland_pps encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6208">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6209">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6209">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6210">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6211">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6211">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6212">A função Func_ireland_pps encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6212">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6213">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6213">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6258">Número da conta bancária de Israel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6258">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6259">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6259">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6260">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6260">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6261">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6261">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6262">Formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6262">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6263">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6263">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6264">um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6264">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6265">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6265">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6266">um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6266">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6267">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6267">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6268">Não formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6268">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6269">13 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6269">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6270">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6271">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6271">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6272">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6273">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6273">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6274">A expressão regular Regex_israel_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6274">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6275">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_israel_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6275">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6282">Número de identificação nacional de Israel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6282">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6283">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6284">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6284">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6285">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6286">nove dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6286">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6287">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6287">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6288">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6288">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6289">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6289">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6290">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6290">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6291">A função Func_israeli_national_id_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6291">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6292">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_Israel_National_ID for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6292">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6293">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6293">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
