## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6312">Número da carteira de motorista da Itália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6312">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6313">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está incluída no tipo de informação confidenciais número de licença do driver da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais autônomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6313">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6314">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6314">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6315">uma combinação de 10 letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6315">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6316">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6316">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6317">uma combinação de 10 letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6317">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6318">uma letra (não sensível a minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6318">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6319">a letra "A" ou "V" (não sensitivo para minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6319">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6320">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6320">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6321">uma letra (não sensível a minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6321">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6322">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6323">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6323">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6324">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6325">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6326">A expressão regular `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6326">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6327">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6327">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6454">Código fiscal da Itália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6454">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6455">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6455">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6456">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6456">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6457">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6457">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6458">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6458">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6459">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6459">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6460">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6460">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6461">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6462">uma combinação de 16 caracteres de letras e dígitos no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6462">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6463">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6464">Uma combinação de 16 caracteres de letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6464">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6465">três letras que correspondem às três primeiras consoantes no nome da família</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6465">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6466">três letras que correspondem à primeira, terceira e quarta consoantes no primeiro nome</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6466">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6467">dois dígitos que correspondem aos últimos dígitos do ano de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6467">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6468">uma letra que corresponde à letra do mês de nascimento: as letras são usadas em ordem alfabética, mas apenas as letras A a E, H, L, M, P, R a T são usadas (portanto, janeiro é A e outubro é R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6468">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6469">dois dígitos que correspondem ao dia do mês de nascimento— para diferenciar entre os sexos, 40 é adicionado ao dia de nascimento das mulheres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6469">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6470">quatro dígitos que correspondem ao código de área específico do município em que a pessoa nasceu (códigos em todo o país são usados para países estrangeiros)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6470">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6471">um dígito de paridade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6471">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6472">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6472">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6473">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6473">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6474">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6474">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6475">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6475">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6476">A função  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6476">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6477">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6477">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6478">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6478">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6479">A função  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6479">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6514">Número do passaporte da Itália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6514">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6515">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6516">duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6516">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6517">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6518">duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6518">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6519">dois dígitos ou letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6519">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6520">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6520">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6521">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6521">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6522">não se aplica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6522">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6523">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6523">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6524">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6524">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6525">A expressão regular  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6525">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6526">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6526">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6527">A expressão regular localiza a data no formato `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Exemplo - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6527">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6528">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6528">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6529">A expressão regular  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6529">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6530">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6530">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6554">Número de imposto adicionado ao valor da Itália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6554">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6555">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6555">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6556">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6556">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6557">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6557">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6558">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6558">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6559">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6559">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6560">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6560">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6561">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6562">Padrão alfanumérico de 13 caracteres com delimitadores opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6562">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6563">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6564">Padrão alfanumérico de 13 caracteres com delimitadores opcionais:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6564">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6565">I ou i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6565">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6566">T ou t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6566">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6567">espaço opcional, ponto, hífen ou vírgula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6567">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6568">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6568">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6569">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6570">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6570">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6571">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6572">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6572">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6573">A função Func_italy_value_added_tax_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6573">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6574">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6574">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6575">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6575">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6576">A função Func_italy_value_added_tax_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6576">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6584">Número da conta bancária do Japão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6584">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6585">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6586">sete ou oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6586">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6587">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6588">número da conta bancária:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6588">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6589">sete ou oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6589">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6590">código de filial de conta bancária:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6590">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6591">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6591">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6592">um espaço ou traço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6592">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6593">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6593">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6594">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6595">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6595">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6596">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6597">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6597">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6598">A função Func_jp_bank_account localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6598">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6599">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_bank_account for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6599">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6600">Uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6600">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6601">A função Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6601">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6602">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6602">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6603">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6603">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6604">A função Func_jp_bank_account localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6604">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6605">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_bank_account for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6605">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6700">Japão Meu Número - Corporativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6700">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6701">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6701">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6702">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6702">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6703">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6703">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6704">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6704">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6705">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6705">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6706">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6706">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6707">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6707">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6708">Número de 13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6708">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6709">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6709">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6710">Número de 13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6710">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6711">um dígito de um a nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6711">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6712">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6712">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6713">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6714">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6714">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6715">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6716">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6716">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6719">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6719">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

        </Pattern>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6747">um espaço opcional, ponto ou hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6747">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>

        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />

```xml

    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6796">Número do cartão de residência do Japão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6796">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6797">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6798">12 letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6798">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6799">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6800">12 letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6800">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6801">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6801">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6802">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6802">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6803">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6803">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6804">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6807">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6808">A expressão regular Regex_jp_residence_card_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6808">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6821">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6822">11 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6822">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6823">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6824">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6824">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6825">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6826">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6826">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6827">A função Func_jp_resident_registration_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6827">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6828">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6828">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6841">Número de seguro social do Japão (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6841">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6842">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6843">7 a 12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6843">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6844">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6844">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6845">7 a 12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6845">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6846">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6846">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6847">um hífen (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6847">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6848">OR de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6848">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6849">7 a 12 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6849">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6850">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6851">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6851">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6852">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6853">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6853">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6854">A função Func_jp_sin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6854">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6855">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_sin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6855">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6856">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6857">A função Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6857">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6858">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_sin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6858">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6879">Número da carteira de motorista da Letônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6879">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6880">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6881">três letras seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6881">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6882">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6883">três letras e seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6883">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6884">três letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6884">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6885">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6885">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6886">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6886">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6887">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6887">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-6888">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6888">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-6889">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6889">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6890">A expressão regular  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6890">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-6891">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-6891">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7016">Código pessoal da Letônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7016">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7017">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7018">11 dígitos e um hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7018">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7019">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7019">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7020">Formato antigo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7020">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7021">11 dígitos e um hífen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7021">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7022">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (DDMMYYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7022">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7023">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7023">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7024">um dígito que corresponde ao século de nascimento ("0" para o século 19, "1" para o século 20 e "2" para o século 21)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7024">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7025">quatro dígitos, gerados aleatoriamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7025">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7026">Novo formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7026">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7027">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7027">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7028">Dois dígitos "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7028">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7029">Nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7029">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7030">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7030">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7031">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7031">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7032">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7032">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7033">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7033">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7034">A função  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` ou o regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7034">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7035">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7035">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7036">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7037">A função  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` ou o regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7037">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7100">Número do passaporte da Letônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7100">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7101">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7102">duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7102">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7103">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7104">duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7104">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7105">dois dígitos ou letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7105">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7106">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7106">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7107">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7108">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7108">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7109">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7110">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7111">A expressão regular  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7111">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7112">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7113">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7113">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7114">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7115">A expressão regular  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7115">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7116">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7116">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7139">Número da carteira de motorista da Lituânia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7139">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7140">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7141">oito dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7141">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7142">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7143">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7143">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7144">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7144">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7145">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7145">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7146">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7146">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7147">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7147">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7148">A expressão regular  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7148">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7149">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7149">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7274">Código pessoal da Lituânia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7274">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7275">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7275">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7276">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7276">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7277">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7277">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7278">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7278">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7279">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7279">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7280">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7280">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7281">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7282">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7282">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7283">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7284">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7284">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7285">um dígito (1 a 6) que corresponde ao sexo e ao século de nascimento da pessoa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7285">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7286">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7286">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7287">três dígitos que correspondem ao número de série da data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7287">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7288">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7288">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7289">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7290">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7290">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7291">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7292">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7292">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7293">A função  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7293">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7294">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7294">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7295">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7295">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7296">A função  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7296">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7331">Número do passaporte lituano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7331">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7332">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7333">oito dígitos ou letras sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7333">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7334">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7335">oito dígitos ou letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7335">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7336">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7337">não se aplica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7337">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7338">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7339">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7339">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7340">A expressão regular  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7340">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7341">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7341">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7342">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date3` localiza data no formato DD MM YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7342">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7343">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7343">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7344">A expressão regular  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7344">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7345">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7345">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7365">Número da carteira de motorista de Luxemburgo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7365">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7366">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7367">seis dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7367">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7368">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7369">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7369">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7370">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7371">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7371">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7372">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7373">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7373">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7374">A expressão regular  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7374">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7375">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7375">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7499">Número de identificação nacional de Luxemburgo (pessoas físicas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7499">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7500">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7500">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7501">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7501">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7502">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7502">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7503">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7503">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7504">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7504">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7505">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7505">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7506">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7507">13 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7507">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7508">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7509">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7509">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7510">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7510">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7511">dois dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7511">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7512">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7513">sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7513">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7514">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7515">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7515">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7516">A função  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7516">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7517">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7517">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7518">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7518">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7519">A função  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7519">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7542">Número do passaporte luxemburgues</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7542">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7543">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7544">oito dígitos ou letras sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7544">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7545">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7546">oito dígitos ou letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7546">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7547">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7547">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7548">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7548">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7549">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7549">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7550">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7550">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7551">A expressão regular  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7551">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7552">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7552">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7553">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date3` localiza data no formato DD MM YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7553">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7554">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7554">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7555">A expressão regular  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7555">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7556">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7556">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
