## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7588">Número de identificação nacional de Luxemburgo (pessoas não naturais)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7588">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7589">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7589">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7590">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7590">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7591">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7591">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7592">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7592">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7593">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7594">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7594">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7595">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7595">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7596">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7596">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7597">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7597">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7598">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7598">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7599">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7599">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7600">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7600">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7601">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7602">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7602">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7603">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7604">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7604">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7605">A função  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7605">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7606">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7606">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7607">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7607">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7608">A função  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7608">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7648">Número do cartão de identificação da Malásia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7648">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7649">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7649">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7650">12 dígitos contendo hifens opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7650">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7651">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7651">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7652">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7652">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7653">seis dígitos no formato YYMMDD, que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7653">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7654">um traço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7654">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7655">código de local de nascimento de duas letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7655">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7656">um traço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7656">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7657">três dígitos aleatórios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7657">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7658">código de gênero de um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7658">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7659">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7660">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7661">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7662">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7662">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7663">A expressão regular Regex_malaysia_id_card_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7663">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7664">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7664">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7691">Número da carteira de motorista de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7691">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7692">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7693">Combinação de dois caracteres e seis dígitos no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7693">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7694">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7695">combinação de dois caracteres e seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7695">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7696">dois caracteres (dígitos ou letras, não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7696">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7697">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7697">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7698">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7698">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7699">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7699">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7700">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7700">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7701">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7702">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7702">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7703">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7704">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7705">A expressão regular  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7706">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7830">Número do cartão de identidade de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7830">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7831">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7831">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7832">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7832">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7833">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7833">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7834">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7834">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7835">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7835">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7836">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7836">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7837">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7838">sete dígitos seguidos por uma letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7838">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7839">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7840">sete dígitos seguidos por uma letra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7840">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7841">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7841">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7842">uma letra em "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7842">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7843">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7844">Não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7844">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7845">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7846">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7847">A expressão regular  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7847">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7848">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7848">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7849">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7849">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7850">A expressão regular  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7850">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7867">Número do passaporte de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7867">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7868">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7869">sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7869">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7870">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7871">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7871">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7872">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7873">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7873">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7874">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7875">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7876">A expressão regular  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7876">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7877">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7877">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7878">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` de é encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7878">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7879">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7880">A expressão regular  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7880">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7881">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7881">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7882">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7882">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7883">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7883">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7901">Número de identificação fiscal de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7901">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7902">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7903">Para nacionais malteses:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7903">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7904">sete dígitos e uma letra no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7904">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7905">Entidades não maltesas e nacionais maltesas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7905">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7906">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7906">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7907">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7908">Nacionais malteses: sete dígitos e uma letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7908">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7909">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7909">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7910">uma letra (não sensível a minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7910">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7911">Nacionais não malteses e entidades maltesas: nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7911">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7912">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7912">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7913">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7914">Não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7914">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7915">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7916">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7916">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7917">O regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7917">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7918">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7918">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7919">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7919">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7920">O regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7920">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7953">Cartão de Identificador de Beneficiário do Medicare (MBI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7953">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7954">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7954">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7955">padrão alfanumérico de 11 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7955">eleven character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7956">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7956">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7957">um dígito entre 1 e 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7957">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7958">uma letra excluindo S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7958">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7959">um dígito ou letra excluindo S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7959">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7960">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7960">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7961">um Hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7961">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7962">uma letra excluindo S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7962">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7963">um dígito ou letra excluindo S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7963">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7964">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7964">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7965">um Hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7965">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7966">duas letras excluindo S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7966">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7967">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7967">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7968">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7968">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7969">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7969">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7970">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7970">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7971">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7971">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7972">A expressão regular  `Regex_mbi_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7972">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7973">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keyword_mbi_card` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7973">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7974">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7974">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7975">A expressão regular  `Regex_mbi_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7975">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7976">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7976">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7977">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7977">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7978">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7978">mbi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7979">mbi #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7979">mbi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7980">beneficiário do plano de saúde #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7980">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7981">identificador do beneficiário do plano de saúde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7981">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7982">não do beneficiário do plano de saúde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7982">medicare beneficiary no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7983">número do beneficiário do plano de saúde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7983">medicare beneficiary number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7984">beneficiário do plano de saúde #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7984">medicare beneficiary#</span></span>


## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7985">Código de Registro de População Exclusivo do México (CURP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7985">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7986">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7986">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7987">Padrão alfanumérico de 18 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7987">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7988">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7988">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7989">quatro letras (sem maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7989">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7990">seis dígitos indicando uma data válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7990">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7991">uma letra - H/h ou M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7991">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7992">duas letras indicando um código de estado mexicano válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7992">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7993">três letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7993">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7994">uma letra ou dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7994">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-7995">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7995">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7996">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7996">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7997">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7997">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-7998">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7998">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-7999">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-7999">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8000">A função  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8000">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8001">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8001">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8002">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8002">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8003">A função  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8003">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8024">Número do serviço de cidadãos (BSN) dos Países Baixos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8024">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8025">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8026">oito ou nove dígitos que contêm espaços opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8026">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8027">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8027">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8028">oito e nove dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8028">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8029">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8029">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8030">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8030">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8031">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8031">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8032">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8032">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8033">dois a três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8033">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8034">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8035">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8035">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8036">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8037">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8037">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8038">A função Func_netherlands_bsn localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8038">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8039">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_netherlands_bsn é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8039">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8040">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8040">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8064">Número da carteira de motorista dos Países Baixos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8064">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8065">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8066">dez dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8066">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8067">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8068">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8068">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8069">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8069">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8070">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8070">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8071">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8071">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8072">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8072">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8073">A expressão regular  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8073">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8074">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8074">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8202">Número do passaporte holandês</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8202">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8203">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8204">nove letras ou dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8204">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8205">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8206">nove letras ou dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8206">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8207">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8207">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8208">não se aplica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8208">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8209">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8209">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8210">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8210">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8211">A expressão regular  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8211">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8212">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8212">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8213">A expressão regular localiza a data no `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` formato DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Exemplo - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8213">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8214">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8215">A expressão regular  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8215">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8216">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8216">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8244">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8244">nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8248">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8251">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8251">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8252">A função  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8252">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8293">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8293">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8296">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8296">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8297">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8297">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8298">Padrão alfanumérico de 14 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8298">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8299">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8299">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8300">Padrão alfanumérico de 14 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8300">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8301">N ou n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8301">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8302">L ou l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8302">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8303">espaço opcional, ponto ou hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8303">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8304">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8304">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8305">espaço opcional, ponto ou hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8305">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8306">B ou b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8306">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8307">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8307">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8308">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8308">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8309">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8309">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8310">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8310">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8311">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8311">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8312">A função Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8312">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8313">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8313">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8314">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8314">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8315">A função Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8315">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8341">dois a três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8341">two to three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8344">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8344">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8345">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8346">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8346">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8348">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8348">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8349">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8349">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8350">A função Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8350">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8462">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8462">Yes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8464">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8464">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8465">A função Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8465">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8466">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8466">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8467">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8467">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8468">A função Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8468">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8477">Número do Ministério da Saúde da Nova Zelândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8477">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8478">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8479">três letras, um espaço (opcional) e quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8479">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8480">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8480">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8481">três letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas), exceto 'I' e 'O'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8481">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8482">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8482">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8483">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8483">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8484">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8485">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8486">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8487">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8488">A função Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8488">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8489">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_nz_terms for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8489">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8490">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8491">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8492">A função Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8492">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8493">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8493">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8529">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8530">A função Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8530">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8538">Número de identificação da Noruega</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8538">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8539">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8540">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8540">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8541">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8542">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8542">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8543">seis dígitos no formato DDMMYYY que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8543">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8544">número individual de três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8544">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8545">dois dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8545">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8546">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8547">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8547">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8548">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8549">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8549">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8550">A função Func_norway_id_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8550">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8551">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_norway_id_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8551">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8552">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8552">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8553">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8553">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8554">A função Func_norway_id_numbe encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8554">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8555">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8555">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>

```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8564">Número de identificação multiuso unificado das Filipinas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8564">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8565">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8566">12 dígitos separados por hifens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8566">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8567">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8568">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8568">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8569">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8569">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8570">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8570">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8571">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8571">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8572">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8572">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8573">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8573">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8574">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8574">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8575">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8575">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8576">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8576">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8577">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8577">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8578">A expressão regular Regex_philippines_unified_id encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8578">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8579">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_philippines_id é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8579">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8580">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8580">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8582">Identificação Multiuso Unificada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8582">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8583">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8583">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8584">Cartão de Identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8584">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8585">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8585">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8586">Número da carteira de motorista da Polônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8586">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8587">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8588">14 dígitos contendo duas barras à frente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8588">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8589">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8590">14 dígitos e duas barras à frente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8590">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8591">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8591">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8592">uma barra de avanço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8592">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8593">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8594">uma barra de avanço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8594">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8595">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8595">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8596">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8597">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8597">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8598">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8599">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8599">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8600">A expressão regular  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8600">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8601">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8601">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8725">Cartão de identidade da Polônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8725">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8726">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8726">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8727">três letras e seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8727">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8728">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8728">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8729">três letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas) seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8729">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8730">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8731">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8731">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8732">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8733">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8734">A função Func_polish_national_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8734">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8735">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8735">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8736">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8737">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8737">Keywords</span></span>
