## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8747">ID nacional da Polônia (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8747">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8748">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8749">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8749">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8750">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8750">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8751">seis dígitos que representam a data de nascimento no formato YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8751">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8752">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8752">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8753">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8753">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8754">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8755">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8755">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8756">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8757">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8757">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8758">A função Func_pesel_identification_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8758">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8759">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_pesel_identification_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8759">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8760">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8760">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8761">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8761">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8762">A função Func_pesel_identification_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8762">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8763">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8763">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8775">Número do passaporte polonês</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8775">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8776">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está incluída no tipo de informação confidenciais número de passaporte da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8776">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8777">Ele está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação independente e sensível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8777">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8778">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8778">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8779">duas letras e sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8779">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8780">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8780">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8781">Duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas) seguidas por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8781">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8782">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8782">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8783">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8783">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8784">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8784">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8785">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8785">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8786">A função `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8786">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8787">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8787">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8788">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8788">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8789">Uma palavra-chave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8789">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8790">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8790">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8791">A função `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8791">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8792">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8792">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8793">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8793">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8794">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8795">A função `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8795">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8796">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8797">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8797">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8798">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8798">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8822">Número REGON da Polônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8822">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8823">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8824">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8825">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8826">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8827">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8828">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8829">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8830">Número de 9 dígitos ou 14 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8830">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8831">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8832">nove dígitos ou número de 14 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8832">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8833">nove dígitos ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8833">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8834">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8834">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8835">hifen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8835">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8836">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8836">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8837">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8838">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8839">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8840">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8840">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8841">A função Func_polish_regon_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8841">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8842">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_polish_regon_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8842">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8843">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8843">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8844">A função Func_polish_regon_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8844">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8862">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8862">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8863">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8863">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8867">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8867">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8868">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8869">11 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8869">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8870">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8871">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8871">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8872">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8872">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8874">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8875">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8876">A função  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8876">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8877">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8877">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml

      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8907">Número do cartão de cidadão de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8907">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8908">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8908">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8909">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8909">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8910">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8910">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8911">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8911">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8912">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8913">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8913">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8914">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8915">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8915">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8916">A expressão regular Regex_portugal_citizen_card encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8916">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8917">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_portugal_citizen_card é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8917">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8937">Número da carteira de motorista de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8937">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8938">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8939">dois padrões - duas letras seguidas por 5 a 8 dígitos com caracteres especiais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8939">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8940">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8941">Padrão 1: Duas letras seguidas por 5/6 com caracteres especiais:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8941">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8942">Duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8942">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8943">Um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8943">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8944">Cinco ou seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8944">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8945">Um espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8945">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8946">Um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8946">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8947">Padrão 2: Uma letra seguida de 6/8 dígitos com caracteres especiais:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8947">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8948">Uma letra (não sensível a minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8948">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8949">Um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8949">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8950">Seis ou oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8950">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8951">Um espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8951">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8952">Um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8952">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8953">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8953">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8954">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8954">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-8955">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8955">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-8956">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8956">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8957">A expressão regular  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8957">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-8958">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-8958">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9090">Número do passaporte de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9090">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9091">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9092">uma letra seguida por seis dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9092">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9093">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9094">uma letra seguida por seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9094">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9095">uma letra (não sensível a minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9095">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9096">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9096">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9097">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9098">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9098">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9099">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9100">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9100">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9101">A expressão regular  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9101">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9102">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9102">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9103">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9103">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9104">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9104">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9105">A expressão regular  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9105">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9106">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9106">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9133">Número de identificação fiscal de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9133">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9134">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9135">nove dígitos com espaços opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9135">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9136">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9136">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9137">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9137">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9138">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9138">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9139">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9139">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9140">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9140">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9141">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9141">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9142">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9143">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9143">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9144">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9145">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9145">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9146">A função  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9146">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9147">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9147">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9148">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9148">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9149">A função  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9149">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9174">Número da carteira de motorista da Romênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9174">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9175">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9175">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9176">um caractere seguido por oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9176">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9177">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9177">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9178">um caractere seguido por oito dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9178">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9179">uma letra (não sensível a minúsculas) ou dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9179">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9180">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9180">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9181">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9182">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9183">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9184">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9184">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9185">A expressão regular  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9185">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9186">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9314">Código numérico pessoal da Romênia (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9314">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9315">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9315">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9316">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9316">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9317">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9317">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9318">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9318">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9319">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9319">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9320">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9320">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9321">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9322">13 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9322">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9323">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9323">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9324">um dígito de 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9324">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9325">seis dígitos que representam a data de nascimento (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9325">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9326">dois dígitos, que podem ser 01-52 ou 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9326">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9327">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9327">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9328">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9329">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9329">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9330">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9331">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9331">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9332">A função  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9332">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9333">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9333">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9334">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9334">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9335">A função  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9335">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9386">Número do passaporte romeno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9386">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9387">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9388">oito ou nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9388">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9389">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9390">oito ou nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9390">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9391">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9392">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9392">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9393">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9394">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9395">A expressão regular  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9395">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9396">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9397">A expressão regular localiza a data no formato `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (Exemplo- 01 FEB/FEB 10) ou uma palavra-chave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date` é encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9397">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9398">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9399">A expressão regular  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9399">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9400">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9401">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9401">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9402">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9402">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9438">O Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic regex localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9438">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9492">ID nacional da Arábia Saudita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9492">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9493">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9494">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9494">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9495">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9496">10 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9496">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9497">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9498">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9498">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9499">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9500">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9501">A expressão regular Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9501">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9502">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9502">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9509">Número do NRIC (cartão de identidade de registro nacional) de Cingapura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9509">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9510">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9510">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9511">nove letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9511">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9512">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9512">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9513">nove letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9513">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9514">a letra "F", "G", "S" ou "T" (não sensível a minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9514">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9515">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9515">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9516">um dígito de verificação alfabética</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9516">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9517">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9518">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9519">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9520">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9521">A expressão regular Regex_singapore_nric encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9521">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9522">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_singapore_nric é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9522">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9523">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9524">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9525">A expressão regular Regex_singapore_nric encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9525">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9526">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9526">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9537">Número da carteira de motorista da Eslováquia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9537">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9538">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9539">um caractere seguido por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9539">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9540">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9541">um caractere seguido por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9541">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9542">uma letra (não sensível a minúsculas) ou dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9542">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9543">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9543">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9544">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9545">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9545">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9546">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9547">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9547">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9548">A expressão regular  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9548">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9549">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9549">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9675">Número pessoal da Eslováquia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9675">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9676">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9676">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9677">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9677">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9678">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9678">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9679">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9679">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9680">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9680">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9681">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9681">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9682">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9683">nove ou dez dígitos que contêm backslash opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9683">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9684">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9684">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9685">seis dígitos que representam a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9685">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9686">barra opcional (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9686">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9687">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9687">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9688">um dígito de verificação opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9688">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9689">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9690">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9690">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9691">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9692">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9692">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9693">A função  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9693">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9694">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9694">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9695">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9695">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9696">A função  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9696">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9743">Número do passaporte da Eslováquia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9743">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9744">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9745">um dígito ou letra seguido por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9745">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9746">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9747">um dígito ou letra (não sensível a minúsculas) seguido por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9747">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9748">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9749">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9750">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9751">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9752">A expressão regular  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9752">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9753">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9754">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9754">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9755">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9755">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9756">A expressão regular  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9756">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9757">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9757">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->

          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9779">Número da carteira de motorista da Eslovênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9779">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9780">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9781">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9781">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9782">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9783">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9783">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9784">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9785">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9785">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9786">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9787">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9787">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9788">A expressão regular  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9788">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9789">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9789">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9916">Número de cidadão mestre exclusivo da Eslovênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9916">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9917">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9917">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9918">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9918">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9919">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9919">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9920">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9920">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9921">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9921">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9922">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9922">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9923">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9923">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9924">13 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9924">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9925">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9925">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9926">13 dígitos no padrão especificado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9926">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9927">sete dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (DDMMLLL) em que "LLL" corresponde aos últimos três dígitos do ano de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9927">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9928">dois dígitos que correspondem à área de nascimento "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9928">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9929">três dígitos que correspondem a uma combinação de sexo e número de série para pessoas que nasceram no mesmo dia (000-499 para homens e 500-999 para mulheres)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9929">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9930">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9930">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9931">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9932">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9932">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9933">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9934">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9934">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9935">A função  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9935">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9936">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9936">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9937">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9937">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9938">A função  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9938">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
