## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9966">Número do passaporte eslovênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9966">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9967">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9968">duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9968">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9969">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9970">duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9970">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9971">a letra "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9971">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9972">uma letra maiúscula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9972">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9973">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9973">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9974">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9975">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9975">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9976">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9977">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9977">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9978">A expressão regular  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9978">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9979">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9979">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9980">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9980">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-9981">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9982">A expressão regular  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9982">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9983">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9983">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9984">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9984">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-9985">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9985">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9986">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9986">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9987">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9987">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9988">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9988">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9989">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9989">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-9990">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-9990">passportno</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10007">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10007">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10008">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10008">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10009">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10009">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10010">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10010">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10011">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10011">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10012">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10012">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10013">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10014">oito dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10014">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10015">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10015">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10016">um dígito de 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10016">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10017">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10017">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10018">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10018">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10019">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10020">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10020">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10021">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10022">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10022">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10023">A função  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10023">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10024">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10024">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10025">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10025">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10026">A função  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10026">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10050">Número de identificação da África do Sul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10050">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10051">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10052">13 dígitos que podem conter espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10052">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10053">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10054">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10054">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10055">seis dígitos no formato YYMMDD, que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10055">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10056">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10056">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10057">um indicador de cidadania de um único dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10057">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10058">o dígito "8" ou "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10058">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10059">um dígito, que é um dígito checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10059">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10060">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10061">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10061">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10062">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10063">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10063">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10064">A função Func_south_africa_identification_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10064">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10065">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_south_africa_identification_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10065">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10066">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10066">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10072">Número de registro de residente da Coreia do Sul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10072">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10073">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10074">13 dígitos que contém um hifen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10074">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10075">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10076">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10076">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10077">seis dígitos no formato YYMMDD, que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10077">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10078">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10078">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10079">um dígito determinado pelo século e pelo gênero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10079">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10080">código de região de nascimento de quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10080">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10081">um dígito usado para diferenciar pessoas para as quais os números anteriores são idênticos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10081">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10082">um dígito de verificação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10082">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10083">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10084">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10084">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10085">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10086">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10086">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10087">A função Func_south_korea_resident_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10087">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10088">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_south_korea_resident_number é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10088">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10089">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10089">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10090">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10090">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10091">A função Func_south_korea_resident_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10091">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10092">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10092">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10100">Número da carteira de motorista da Espanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10100">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10101">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10102">oito dígitos seguidos por um caractere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10102">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10103">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10104">oito dígitos seguidos por um caractere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10104">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10105">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10105">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10106">um dígito ou uma letra (não sensitivo para minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10106">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10107">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10108">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10108">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10109">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10110">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10111">A função  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10111">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10112">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10113">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10113">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10114">A função  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10114">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10248">DNI da Espanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10248">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10249">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10249">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10250">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10250">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10251">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10251">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10252">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10252">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10253">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10253">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10254">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10254">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10255">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10256">oito dígitos seguidos por um caractere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10256">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10257">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10258">sete dígitos seguidos por um caractere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10258">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10259">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10259">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10260">Um espaço opcional ou hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10260">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10261">uma letra de verificação (não sensível a minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10261">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10262">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10263">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10263">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10264">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10265">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10265">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10266">A função  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10266">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10267">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10267">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10268">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10268">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10269">A função  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10269">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10293">Número do passaporte espanhol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10293">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10294">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10294">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10295">uma combinação de oito ou nove caracteres de letras e números sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10295">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10296">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10297">uma combinação de oito ou nove caracteres de letras e números:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10297">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10298">dois dígitos ou letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10298">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10299">um dígito ou letra (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10299">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10300">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10300">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10301">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10302">Não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10302">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10303">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10304">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10305">A expressão regular  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10305">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10306">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10306">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10307">A expressão regular `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` localiza a data no formato DD-MM-YYYY ou uma palavra-chave de é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10307">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10308">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10308">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10309">A expressão regular  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10309">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10310">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10310">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10339">Número de segurança social da Espanha (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10339">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10340">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10340">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10341">11 a 12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10341">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10342">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10342">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10343">11 a 12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10343">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10344">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10344">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10345">uma barra de avanço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10345">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10346">sete a oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10346">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10347">uma barra de avanço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10347">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10348">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10348">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10349">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10350">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10350">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10351">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10352">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10352">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10353">A função Func_spanish_social_security_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10353">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10354">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10354">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10355">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10355">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10356">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10356">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10357">A função Func_spanish_social_security_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10357">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10358">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10358">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10367">Número de identificação fiscal da Espanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10367">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10368">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10368">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10369">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10369">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10370">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10370">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10371">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10371">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10372">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10372">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10373">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10373">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10374">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10375">sete ou oito dígitos e uma ou duas letras no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10375">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10376">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10376">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10377">Pessoas Naturais da Espanha com um Cartão de Identidade Nacional da Espanha:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10377">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10378">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10378">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10379">uma letra maiúscula (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10379">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10380">Não residentes em espanhol sem um Cartão de Identidade Nacional da Espanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10380">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10381">uma letra maiúscula "L" (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10381">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10382">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10382">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10383">uma letra maiúscula (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10383">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10384">Residentes espanheses menores de 14 anos sem um Cartão de Identidade Nacional da Espanha:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10384">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10385">uma letra maiúscula "K" (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10385">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10386">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10386">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10387">uma letra maiúscula (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10387">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10388">Estrangeiros com um número de identificação de estrangeiro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10388">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10389">uma letra maiúscula que é "X", "Y" ou "Z" (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10389">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10390">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10390">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10391">uma letra maiúscula (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10391">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10392">Estrangeiros sem um Número de Identificação de Estrangeiro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10392">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10393">uma letra maiúscula que é "M" (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10393">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10394">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10394">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10395">uma letra maiúscula (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10395">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10396">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10397">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10397">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10398">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10399">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10400">A função  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10400">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10401">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10401">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10402">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10402">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10403">A função  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10403">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10434">SQL Server de conexão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10434">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10435">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10436">A cadeia de caracteres "ID do usuário", "ID do usuário", "uid" ou "UserId" seguida pelos caracteres e cadeias de caracteres descritos no padrão abaixo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10436">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10437">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10437">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10438">a cadeia de caracteres "ID do usuário", "ID do usuário", "uid" ou "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10438">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10439">qualquer combinação de entre 1 a 200 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10439">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10440">a cadeia de caracteres "Password" ou "pwd" onde "pwd" não é precedida por uma letra minúscula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10440">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10441">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10441">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10442">qualquer caractere que não seja um sinal de dólar ($), símbolo de porcentagem (%), maior que o símbolo (>), em símbolo (@), ponto de aspas ("), ponto e vírgula (;), chave esquerda([) ou colchete esquerdo ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10442">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10443">qualquer combinação de 7 a 128 caracteres que não sejam ponto e vírgula (;), barra (/) ou aspas (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10443">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10444">um ponto e vírgula (;) ou aspas (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10444">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10445">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10446">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10446">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10447">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10448">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10448">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10449">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10449">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10450">Uma palavra-chave CEP_GlobalFilter não foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10450">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10451">A expressão regular CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder não encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10451">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10452">A expressão regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords não encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10452">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10480">Número da carteira de motorista da Suécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10480">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10481">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10482">dez dígitos contendo um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10482">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10483">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10484">dez dígitos contendo um hífen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10484">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10485">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10485">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10486">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10486">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10487">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10487">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10488">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10489">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10489">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10490">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10491">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10492">A expressão regular  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10492">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10493">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10493">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10626">ID nacional da Suécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10626">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10627">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10627">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10628">10 ou 12 dígitos e um delimitador opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10628">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10629">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10629">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10630">10 ou 12 dígitos e um delimitador opcional:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10630">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10631">dois dígitos (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10631">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10632">Seis dígitos no formato de data AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10632">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10633">delimiter de "-" ou "+" (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10633">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10634">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10634">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10635">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10636">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10636">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10637">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10638">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10638">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10639">A função `Func_swedish_national_identifier` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10639">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10640">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` de é encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10640">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10641">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10641">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10642">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10642">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10643">A função `Func_swedish_national_identifier` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10643">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10644">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10644">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10663">Número do passaporte da Suécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10663">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10664">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10665">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10665">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10666">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10667">oito dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10667">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10668">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10669">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10669">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10670">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10671">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10671">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10672">a expressão regular Regex_sweden_passport_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10672">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10673">uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keyword_sweden_passport` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10673">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10674">a expressão regular localiza uma data no formato `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) ou uma palavra-chave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10674">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10675">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10676">a expressão regular Regex_sweden_passport_number encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10676">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10677">uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keyword_sweden_passport` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10677">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10713">Número de identificação fiscal da Suécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10713">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10714">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10714">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10715">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10715">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10716">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10716">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10717">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10717">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10718">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10718">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10719">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10719">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10720">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10721">10 dígitos e um símbolo no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10721">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10722">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10723">10 dígitos e um símbolo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10723">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10724">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10724">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10725">um sinal de a mais ou sinal de menos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10725">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10726">três dígitos que fazem com que o número de identificação seja exclusivo em que:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10726">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10727">para números emitidos antes de 1990, o sétimo e oitavo dígito identificam o município de nascimento ou pessoas de origem estrangeira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10727">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10728">o dígito na nona posição indica o sexo por ímpar para o sexo masculino ou até mesmo para mulheres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10728">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10729">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10729">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10730">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10731">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10731">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10732">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10733">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10733">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10734">A função  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10734">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10735">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10735">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10736">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10736">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10737">A função  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10737">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10763">Código SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10763">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10764">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10765">quatro letras seguidas de 5 a 31 letras ou dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10765">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10766">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10767">quatro letras seguidas de 5 a 31 letras ou dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10767">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10768">código bancário de quatro letras (não sensível a minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10768">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10769">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10769">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10770">4 a 28 letras ou dígitos (o número de conta bancária básica (BBAN))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10770">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10771">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10771">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10772">de uma a três letras ou dígitos (restante do BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10772">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10773">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10774">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10774">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10775">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10776">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10777">A expressão regular Regex_swift localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10777">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10778">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_swift for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10778">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10779">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10779">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10783">iso9362</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10783">iso9362</span></span>
