## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10815">Número SSN AHV da Suíça</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10815">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10816">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10816">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10817">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10817">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10818">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10818">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10819">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10819">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10820">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10820">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10821">Segurança do aplicativo na nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10821">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10822">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10822">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10823">Número de 13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10823">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10824">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10824">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10825">Número de 13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10825">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10826">três dígitos - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10826">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10827">um ponto opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10827">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10828">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10828">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10829">um ponto opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10829">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10830">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10830">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10831">um ponto opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10831">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10832">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10832">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10833">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10833">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10834">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10834">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10835">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10835">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10836">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10836">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10837">A função Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10837">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10838">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10838">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10839">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10839">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10840">A função Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10840">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10861">Número de identificação nacional de Taiwan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10861">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10862">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10863">uma letra (em inglês) seguida de nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10863">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10864">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10865">uma letra (em inglês) seguida de nove dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10865">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10866">uma letra (em inglês, não sensível a minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10866">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10867">o dígito "1" ou "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10867">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10868">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10868">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10869">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10869">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10870">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10870">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10871">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10871">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10872">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10872">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10873">A função Func_taiwanese_national_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10873">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10874">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_taiwanese_national_id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10874">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10875">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10875">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10876">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10876">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10877">A função Func_taiwanese_national_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10877">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10878">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10878">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10895">Número do passaporte de Taiwan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10895">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10896">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10896">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10897">número do passaporte biométrico: nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10897">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10898">número do passaporte não biométrico: nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10898">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10899">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10899">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10900">número do passaporte biométrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10900">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10901">o caractere "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10901">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10902">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10902">eight digits</span></span>

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10947">Código de identificação da população tailandesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10947">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10948">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10960">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10960">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10961">A função Func_Thai_Citizen_Id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10961">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10991">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10991">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10992">Combinação de 18 letras e dígitos no formato especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10992">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-10993">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10993">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-10994">18 letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10994">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10995">Cinco letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas) ou o dígito "9" no lugar de uma letra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10995">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10996">Um dígito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10996">One digit.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-10999">Duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas) ou o dígito "9" no lugar de uma letra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-10999">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11000">Cinco dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11000">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11001">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11002">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11002">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11003">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11004">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11005">A função `Func_uk_drivers_license` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11005">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11006">Uma palavra-chave de `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11006">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11007">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11007">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11008">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11008">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11009">A função `Func_uk_drivers_license` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11009">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11010">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11010">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11131">Reino Unido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11131">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11132">número de rolagem de eleitores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11132">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11133">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11133">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11134">duas letras seguidas de 1 a 4 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11134">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11135">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11135">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11136">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas) seguidas de números de 1 a 4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11136">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11137">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11138">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11139">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11140">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11140">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11141">A expressão regular Regex_uk_electoral localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11141">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11142">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_electoral for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11142">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11149">Reino Unido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11149">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11150">número do serviço de saúde nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11150">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11151">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11152">10 a 17 dígitos separados por espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11152">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11153">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11154">10 a 17 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11154">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11155">3 ou 10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11155">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11156">um espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11156">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11157">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11157">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11158">um espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11158">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11159">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11159">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11160">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11161">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11161">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11162">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11163">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11163">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11164">A função Func_uk_nhs_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11164">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11165">Uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11165">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11166">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11166">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11167">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11167">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11168">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11168">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11169">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11187">Reino Unido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11187">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11188">número de seguro nacional (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11188">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11189">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está incluída no tipo de informação confidenciais número de identificação nacional da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11189">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11190">Ele está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação independente e sensível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11190">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11191">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11192">sete caracteres ou nove caracteres separados por espaços ou traços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11192">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11193">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11194">dois padrões possíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11194">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11195">duas letras (NINOs válidos usam apenas determinados caracteres neste prefixo, que esse padrão valida; não é sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11195">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11196">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11196">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11197">'A', 'B', 'C' ou 'D' (como o prefixo, apenas determinados caracteres são permitidos no sufixo; não são sensíveis a minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11197">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11198">OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11198">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11199">duas letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11199">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11200">um espaço ou traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11200">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11201">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11201">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11202">um espaço ou traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11202">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11203">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11203">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11204">um espaço ou traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11204">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11205">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11205">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11206">um espaço ou traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11206">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11207">'A', 'B', 'C' ou 'D'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11207">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11208">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11208">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11209">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11209">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11210">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11210">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11211">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11211">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11212">A função Func_uk_nino localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11212">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11213">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_nino for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11213">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11214">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11215">A função Func_uk_nino localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11215">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11245">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11245">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11247">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11248">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11248">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11252">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11252">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11275">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11275">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11277">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11277">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11279">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11282">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11282">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11283">A expressão regular Regex_usa_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11283">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11314">Número da carteira de motorista dos EUA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11314">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11315">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11315">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11316">Depende do estado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11316">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11317">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11317">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11318">depende do estado - por exemplo, Nova York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11318">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11319">nove dígitos formatados como ddd ddd ddd corresponderão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11319">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11320">nove dígitos como dddddddddd não corresponderão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11320">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11321">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11321">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11322">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11322">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11323">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11323">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11324">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11324">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11325">A função Func_new_york_drivers_license_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11325">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11326">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11326">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11327">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_us_drivers_license é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11327">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11328">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11328">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11329">A função Func_new_york_drivers_license_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11329">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11330">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11330">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11331">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11331">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11332">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_us_drivers_license for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11332">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11430">NÚMERO DE IDENTIFICAÇÃO individual do contribuinte (ITIN) dos EUA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11430">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11431">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11432">nove dígitos que começam com um "9" e contêm "7" ou "8" como o quarto dígito, opcionalmente formatados com espaços ou traços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11432">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11433">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11434">formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11434">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11435">o dígito "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11435">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11436">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11436">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11437">um espaço ou traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11437">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11438">um "7" ou "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11438">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11439">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11439">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11440">um espaço ou traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11440">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11441">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11441">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11442">não formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11442">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11443">o dígito "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11443">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11444">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11444">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11445">um "7" ou "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11445">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11446">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11446">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11447">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11448">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11448">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11449">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11450">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11450">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11451">A função Func_formatted_itin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11451">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11452">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_itin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11452">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11453">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11453">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11454">A função Func_unformatted_itin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11454">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11455">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_itin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11455">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11456">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11456">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11457">A função Func_formatted_itin ou Func_unformatted_itin o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11457">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11458">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11458">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11472">Número de segurança social dos EUA (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11472">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11473">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11474">nove dígitos, que podem estar em um padrão formatado ou não formatado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11474">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11475">Se emitido antes de meados de 2011, um SSN tem uma formatação forte onde determinadas partes do número devem estar dentro de determinados intervalos para serem válidas (mas não há nenhum checksum).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11475">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11476">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11476">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11477">quatro funções procurar por SSNs em quatro padrões diferentes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11477">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11478">Func_ssn localiza SSNs com formatação forte pré-2011 formatada com traços ou espaços (ddd-dddd OR ddd ddd ddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11478">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn localiza SSNs com formatação forte pré-2011 que não são formatados como nove dígitos consecutivos (dddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn localiza SSNs post-2011 que são formatados com traços ou espaços (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn localiza SSNs pós-2011 não formatados como nove dígitos consecutivos (dddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11482">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11483">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11483">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11484">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11485">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11485">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11487">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_ssn for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11487">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11488">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11488">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11489">A função Func_unformatted_ssn encontra conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11489">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11490">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_ssn for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11490">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11491">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11491">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11492">A função Func_randomized_formatted_ssn localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11492">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11493">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_ssn for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11493">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11494">Uma política de DLP tem baixa confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11494">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11495">A função Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11495">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11496">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_ssn for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11496">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11513">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11513">Format</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11517">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11517">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d517c-11519">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11520">Uma política DLP tem alta confiança de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11521">A função Func_usa_uk_passport localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11521">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11522">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11522">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11523">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` de é encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11523">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d517c-11524">Uma política de DLP tem confiança média de que detectou esse tipo de informação confidenciais se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11525">A função Func_usa_uk_passport localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11525">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d517c-11526">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d517c-11526">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
